wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Galley (4 August 1915 – 12 July 2000) was an English international footballer, who spent the majority of his league career with Wolverhampton Wanderers.

response: * Tom Galley (1915 in Cannock - 2000) professional footballer, over 200 caps mainly for Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.
* Tom Galley (1915–2000) an English international footballer, over 200 caps, mainly for Wolverhampton Wanderers.
